Chittering Skull Flies

6 HP, 6 STR, 12 DEX, 3 CHA, bite (d6), Group of d6

• Fist-sizes adult fly burrows into flesh. Critical damage: lose d6 STR. Builds silk tendons inside of corpses. Can speak through tymbal clicks.

• Upon death, the victim's corpse is used as a puppet.

category: monsters source: discord
